issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
I am facing issue, where my app when upgraded to iOS 12 is working fine, but intermittently crashes after some time and doesn't give any logs in the appcelerator logs. I am not able to understand where the issue is. As suggested that to fix the iOS 12 crashes, when upgrading the apps, I used SDK 7.4.1 but still getting the crash. 

I am unable to share the logs, as it doesn't show when the app crashes. 

When the app crashes, I get to see the message:

-- End application log ------------------------------------------------------- 

and nothing more to find where it crashed. And crash is random at any point on any screen. 

Please help.

comments.body:
I created the build via xCode 10.1 and found in the log as follows:

2018-10-31 14:38:46.889000-0500 PeopleXapp [1472:389146] *** -[TiUIViewProxy setProxyObserver:]: message sent to deallocated instance 0x1161db400
warning: could not execute support code to read Objective-C class data in the process. This may reduce the quality of type information available.
(lldb) 

And the app hangs and nothing tapping anywhere on the screen, no event is fired.

[~mr.jatinjoshi.mca@gmail.com] This could be duplicate of TIMOB-25391. It is getting fixed as part of 7.5.0 release. 
If you are facing freeze issue apart from this, please check TIMOB-26391. This is known issue and we are working on this. Jan has given a temporary build https://www.dropbox.com/s/zasd5dd7j9xl7lx/mobilesdk-7.4.2-osx.zip?dl=0. You can check with this. Thanks!

So, Vijay is 7.4.2 is recommended by AXWAY and is it stable? 

Also, want to know that after 7.4.1 GA release AXWAY Appcelerator is release directly 7.5.0 and when is it expected for release?

Regards
Jatin

I tested my app on 7.4.2 after installing it : appc ti sdk install --branch 7_4_X 7.4.2.v20181101134650

and still the app freezed suddenly at point and then app crashed.


Regards
Jatin

Tested the app with : appc ti sdk install --branch 7_5_X 7.5.0.v20181101101355 and that crashes as well. 


Regards
Jatin
Hello [~mr.jatinjoshi.mca@gmail.com], Please follow up the status of your issue is this still an issue in SDK 7.5.0.GA? Thanks.

Hello,
Just passing as update here. Are you able to get that sorted out? Â Please let us know if you need more help with this issue.
